DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Fatigue HI7 Past 7 Days How Often Feel Fatigued Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation of how often during the past 7 days they feel fatigued, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Fatigue Subordinate Domain Past Week How Often Feel Fatigue Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess fatigue that is likely to decrease an individual's ability to carry out daily activities, including the ability to work effectively and to function at their usual level in family or social roles._The most recent week, including today._A question about the frequency of an event or behavior._A question about whether an individual feels or felt fatigued._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Fatigue Subordinate Domain
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess fatigue that is likely to decrease an individual's ability to carry out daily activities, including the ability to work effectively and to function at their usual level in family or social roles.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess fatigue that is likely to decrease an individual's ability to carry out daily activities, including the ability to work effectively and to function at their usual level in family or social roles.

Property.preferredName: Past Week How Often Feel Fatigue Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about the frequency of an event or behavior.:A question about whether an individual feels or felt fatigued.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about the frequency of an event or behavior.
A question about whether an individual feels or felt fatigued.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PROMIS:Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System, PROMIS Health Organization and PROMIS Cooperative Group, 2008-2012
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study A011401 in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 2/10/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how much of something an individual experiences from 1: Not at all, to 5: Very much.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for ECOG-ACRIN study in Rave. mc 5/4/15
